name: Tom's Cat
description: Players will be presented with a steep and level track, in addition to that players can go up to the iron bar as a reference to capture diamonds. This game that tests dexterity gets a score or a value from the count of the distance in the top right corner board. Distance becomes a point of assessment as well as the success of the player in achieving new rewards such as catching diamonds. This game can be played by all ages. Also beneficial to practice patience and perseverance. Does not require excessive finger activity so playing will not cramp the finger, of course it will be very fun
